name: Secret-santa
body:
Secret Santa helps you organise a blind gift distribution among your family, your mates or even your work team. 
A draw assigns who everyone has to offer a gift to. Everybody gets the same amount of gifts, but nobody knows who it is from.

The Secret Santa add-on allows you to specify participants who should not offer presents to each other.
